lead_paragraph: Katy Perry was the night's big honoree, but Hillary Clinton got the biggest ovation as the former presidential candidate presented the pop star with an award from UNICEF at Tuesday's Snowflake Ball.

headline.main: Hillary Clinton Makes Surprise Appearance at UNICEF Gala
headline.print_headline: Hillary Clinton Makes Surprise Appearance at UNICEF Gala
